敐字的基本解释

敐
chén
击声。
古同“??”，喜而动。

敐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《廣韻》植鄰切，平真，禪。］
(1)击打声。
(2)喜而动貌。

敐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敐； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页471第06
【廣韻】植隣切【集韻】丞眞切，?音辰。與㲀同。喜而動貌。【玉篇】擊聲。　又【廣韻】章忍切【集韻】止忍切，?音軫。??敐敐，喜悅貌。敐字原从攴作。

敐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
敐字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
chén
Hit.
Gu Tong "??", moved with joy.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Guangyun" planting neighbors, plain and true, Zen. ]
(1) Hitting sound.
(2) Happy and moving appearance.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　敐; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 471 06
[Guang Yun] Zhi Lin cut [Ji Yun] Cheng Su cut,? Yin Chen. Same as 㲀. Happy and moving appearance. [Jade articles] The sound of hitting.　 [Guang Yun] Zhang Renqie [Jiyun] Stop Renqie,? Yin Zhen. ?? 敐敐, happy appearance. The word 敐 was originally made from 攴.
